title.rendered: Now You Can Check Visa Status by Your Passport Number

content.rendered:
If your application for a visa has been approved, you can check the status here:

https://smartservices.icp.gov.ae/echannels/web/client/default.html#/fileValidity

At the link, you need to select ‘Passport Information’ in the ‘Search By’ field.

You also need to select either ‘Residency’ or ‘Visa’. If you have applied for a residence visa, you need to select ‘Residency’. On the other hand, if you have applied for a visit visa or an entry permit / e-visa, you need to select ‘Visa’.

You then need to enter your passport number and the Date of Expiry of your passport in the fields that follow below.

You also need to select your country of citizenship from the drop-down menu in the ‘Nationality’ field on the page and the code will be populated automatically.

Finally, you need to complete the captcha before clicking on ‘Search’ in the lower right corner.

If your visa has been issued, you will be provided details like the File Number, Visa Status, Date of Issue, and Date of Expiry.

You are also provided with a six-digit Unified ID number which is used to track any person entering the United Arab Emirates for whatever reason, be it employment, as a tourist, or as a dependent.

What if my visa has not yet been approved?

If you have applied for a visa to Dubai, you can check the current status of your visa application by clicking here.

https://smart.gdrfad.gov.ae/Public_Th/StatusInquiry_New.aspx

This takes you to the website of the General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs, Dubai.

If you find the webpage to be in Arabic, all you need to do is locate ‘English’ on the left side of the page, near the top corner, and click on it for an English version of the page.

The default is set to search by ‘Application’.

You need to enter the Application Number, Transaction Number, and the Payment Date.

You should have received your Application Number when you applied for your e-visa or residency visa.

“When you apply for a visa and make the corresponding payment, a copy of your Application Form along with the Application Number, Transaction Number, and the Date of Payment is provided to you.”

Lekha Anoop, Head of Legal, A&A Associate LLC

You can then complete the captcha and click on the ‘Search’ button in the lower right corner of the page.

If you applied through an Amer Centre in Dubai, you call Amer at 800 5111 to know the latest status of your visa application. You can also email Amer at amer@dnrd.ae or use their website, which can be found here:

https://amer.gdrfad.gov.ae/visa-inquiry

If you have applied for a visa to Abu Dhabi or any of the other five emirates, namely Sharjah, Ajman, Ras Al Khaimah, Umm Al Quwain, and Fujairah; you can use the website of the Federal Authority for Identity and Citizenship to track the status of your visa application.

https://smartservices.icp.gov.ae/echannels/web/client/default.html#/fileValidity

You will see that you have to enter the Request Number (this is the same as the Application Number) and complete the captcha before you can click on ‘Search’ in the bottom right corner to get the details of your visa application.

A&A Associate LLC is a provider of visa services in the United Arab Emirates. If you need help applying for a visa for the United Arab Emirates, please call +971 56 408 6728 or send us a message using the contact form below. We also provide services for business setup in Dubai. We have been of assistance to clients from 100 countries around the world, and have an excellent client satisfaction rate to speak of so far.

Also Read

Company Setup In Dubai
